attributes.action: parliament to issue licences for the extraction of gas by fracking
attributes.additional_details: also place a price cap on this gas
attributes.background: licences for fracking for domestic use only

rejection.details:
We understand you want fracking licenses to be issued, however it's not clear which projects you want such licenses to be granted to. In any case, we can't accept petitions which call for action in respect of individual businesses, including petitions calling for specified operators of energy generating facilities be granted a fracking license.

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

'End the ban on fracking': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608745

'Commit to UK natural gas and increase investment': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608274
